parameters.jsCode:
const data = $input.first().json;
return data.items.map(item => ({ json: { user_id: data.user_id, title: item.title || '', price: item.price || '', url: item.url || item.link || '', source: data.source } }));

parameters.query: INSERT INTO products_master (user_id, title, supplier_url, source_price_jpy, detected_platform, sync_status, profit_score, brand, ebay_api_data, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9::jsonb, NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (supplier_url) DO UPDATE SET source_price_jpy = EXCLUDED.source_price_jpy, profit_score = EXCLUDED.profit_score, ebay_api_data = EXCLUDED.ebay_api_data, updated_at = NOW() WHERE products_master.user_id = $10
